TRAVELGE_THEME = #{travelgeTheme} AND TRAVELGE_REGION =#{travelgeRegion} AND (TRAVELGE_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR TRAVELGE_ADDR LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
